meeting_preferences.frequency: minimizes meetings; prefers 1‑hour weekly sync with team and ad‑hoc 15‑minute stand‑ups
meeting_preferences.format: video preferred for cross‑functional discussions, otherwise audio

work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (3 days remote, 2 days in Austin office)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 2 blocks of 90 minutes per day protected for deep analysis

personality.decision_making_approach: data‑driven with structured pros/cons analysis; seeks stakeholder input before finalizing
personality.risk_tolerance: moderate – comfortable with calculated risks after validation
personality.collaboration_style: independent contributor who actively shares findings; values clear roles
personality.stress_management_approach: short mindfulness breaks, prioritization matrix, and scheduled exercise
personality.conflict_resolution_style: collaborative – focuses on facts and common goals, avoids personal confrontations

availability.timezone_and_working_hours: CST, typically 08:00‑16:00 with 1 hour lunch break
other_commitments: Quarterly professional certification (e.g., Google Data Analytics)
availability.travel_flexibility: up to 15% of time (≈1 week per quarter) for onsite workshops or conferences

personal_factors.commute_situation: 0‑5 miles (bike or walk to office on on‑site days)
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild asthma – prefers indoor air‑quality controls, avoids prolonged exposure to strong scents
personal_factors.career_motivation: Desires to become a Senior Data Scientist leading end‑to‑end analytics initiatives and mentor junior analysts

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: 1‑2 formal meetings per week; short daily async updates via Slack
collaboration.feedback_style: direct but diplomatic – focuses on actionable points
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: writes concise post‑mortems, contributes to internal wiki, runs monthly brown‑bag sessions

potential_bottlenecks: Heavy reliance on single data pipeline (Snowflake ETL) – if downstream fails, analysis stalls
Limited capacity for large‑scale ML model deployment
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Javier Lopez (Senior Data Analyst, familiar with Olivia's dashboards)
burnout_risk_factors: Extended periods of back‑to‑back deadlines without buffer
Excessive meeting load beyond preferred limits
